title: Trump faces mounting legal threat from accusers
text:
Trump faces mounting legal threat from accusers 1:48am IST - 02:10 
President Trump could be forced to testify after a judge ruled a defamation suit against him will move forward. At the same time, two women look to break confidentiality agreements over their alleged affairs with the president.   
President Trump could be forced to testify after a judge ruled a defamation suit against him will move forward. At the same time, two women look to break confidentiality agreements over their alleged affairs with the president.  //reut.rs/2IF4CXQ
